hadith.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"A Bedouin came to the Prophet (ï·º) to ask him about Wudu', so he showed him how to perform Wudu', washing each part three times, then he said: 'This is Wudu'. Whoever does more than that has done badly, done to extremes and done wrong
